about.aboutMe: Driven by curiosity, tech innovation is pushing our world forward at an unprecedented rate. I am a Computer Scientist with a passion for software, innovation and people.
about.aboutMe2: Starting computer science in high school, I focused on Java and SQL database programming. Reading my undergraduate, I took up a focus in software engineering, AI, user interaction and data visualisation. I aim to utilise these areas to make people's life better (more comfortable, happier, more powerful, and more efficient) with technology.
about.aboutMe3: Recently I finished reading an MSc in Software System Engineering so that I can reinforce the fundamentals of software engineering, requirement engineering, software architecture, project management in software and the core of software systems design. I plan to dive into the industry with an expert background in SSE with a passion for innovation, technology, and people.
about.aboutMe4: I am now working as a backend engineer at Marshmallow Insurance, a rapidly growing startup that enforces reliabilty, dilengence, fast results and bleeding-edge thinking in its values.

aboutDetails.heading:
I'm Sven Finlay,
Software System Engineer, Developer, Architect and Designer
